title: Jefferson Health - New Jersey Antimicrobial Stewardship Program Earns 'Gold Steward' Recognition | Jefferson Health
description: For the fourth year in a row, Jefferson Health's three New Jersey hospitals have been recognized as New Jersey Antibiotics Aware Gold Stewards, as part of the New Jersey Department of Health (NJDOH) Antimicrobial Stewardship Recognition Program.
